event.descr: A high threshold for the following metric exceeded: %parm[all]%
event.logmsg: High threshold exceeded for service %service% metric %parm[ds]% on interface %parm[label]%/%interface%

event.descr: Low threshold for the following metric exceeded: %parm[all]%
event.logmsg: Low threshold exceeded for service %service% metric %parm[ds]% on interface %parm[label]%/%interface%

event.descr: High threshold has been rearmed for the following metric: %parm[all]%
event.logmsg: High threshold rearmed for service %service% metric %parm[ds]% on interface %parm[label]%/%interface%

event.descr: Low threshold has been rearmed for the following metric: %parm[all]%
event.logmsg: Low threshold rearmed for service %service% metric %parm[ds]% on interface %parm[label]%/%interface%

event.descr: Relative change threshold for the following metric exceeded: %parm[all]%
event.logmsg: Relative change change exceeded for service %service% metric %parm[ds]% on interface %parm[label]%/%interface%

event.descr: Absolute change threshold for the following metric exceeded: %parm[all]%
event.logmsg: Absolute change exceeded for service %service% metric %parm[ds]% on interface %parm[label]%/%interface%
